Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Type-5 thionin (Type V thionin; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Thionins are small plant proteins which are toxic to animal cells. They seem to exert their toxic effect at the level of the cell membrane.

Literature.Title: Extreme divergence of a novel wheat thionin generated by a mutational burst specifically affecting the mature protein domain of the precursor.
Literature.Author: Castagnaro A, Mara±a C, Carbonero P, Garc­a-Olmedo F.
